user_question: What were the main causes of the fall of the Byzantine Empire, and can you generate an image of the Hagia Sophia during its peak?
final_answer: The main causes of the fall of the Byzantine Empire include internal political instability, economic decline, military defeats, and the rise of the Ottoman Empire. The Fourth Crusade played a significant role by sacking Constantinople in 1204, weakening the empire significantly. Image of the Hagia Sophia during its peak generated.
